project.name: C-C765B-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C765B-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are names of either FIFO files or regular files, and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains non alpha-numeric characters, spawn two threads underscores, spawn two threads. Using a sem_post before ever calling sem_wait causes the counting semaphore to allow two processes into the critical section instead of just one when the previous process unblocks. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have non-alphanumeric characters it.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3690 -s 141 -m "1 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 hephalump!" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C765B-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF19-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are names of either FIFO files or regular files, and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains non alpha-numeric characters, spawn two threads underscores, spawn two threads. Using a sem_post before ever calling sem_wait causes the counting semaphore to allow two processes into the critical section instead of just one when the previous process unblocks. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have non-alphanumeric characters it.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3690 -s 141 -m "60 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 Sniffles_and_whiffles" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_OflrV0L5KHTDCM3Vi50M AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_WBoDScMSnv OR segfault_code_DETRpLpsRF OR segfault_code_OzV57RI4Fw OR segfault_code_ZuhUJ5FE8a OR segfault_code_ClK2v4uNyB OR segfault_msg_caebIGQYk7 OR illegal_inst_msg_FVe0xVCaJq) AND NOT timeout_Ok8JVsd8mo) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_WBoDScMSnv OR segfault_code_DETRpLpsRF OR segfault_code_OzV57RI4Fw OR segfault_code_ZuhUJ5FE8a OR segfault_code_ClK2v4uNyB OR segfault_msg_caebIGQYk7 OR illegal_inst_msg_FVe0xVCaJq) OR timeout_Ok8JVsd8mo)))
